RelatedSentence: Your are currently browsing this site with Internet Explorer 6 ( IE6 ) .
Microsoft has redesigned Internet Explorer from the ground up , with better security , new capabilities , and a whole new interface .
Many changes resulted from the feedback of millions of users who tested prerelease versions of the new browser .
Internet Explorer 7 makes surfing the web fundamentally safer by offering greater protection against viruses , spyware , and other online risks .
